document_data.caption: A map showing the southern end of Book Street.
document_data.name: Book Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Book Street''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved street in the city of [[Waterdeep]] that ran from [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] into the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]].
document_data.Geography:
This street began in the Dock Ward, running north off of the [[Street of Curtains]]. As it made its way northward, Book Street had [[Candle Lane]]

As it was met from the east by the boundary road [[Drakiir Street]], it transitioned into Trades Ward. Shortly afterwards, it was met from the west by the boundary road [[Shesstra's Street]]. Eventually, the road terminated on the south of [[Soothsayer's Way]].

Notable Locations.Friendly Flounder: A small tavern in the Dock Ward on the west side of Book Street, just across from the mouth of Candle Lane.<ref>
Notable Locations.Honorable Knight: One of [[Walking Statues of Waterdeep|Waterdeep's colossal Walking Statues]],
Notable Locations.Serpentil Books & Folios: A shop that sold [[book]]s and [[map]]s, located in the Dock Ward on the east side of Book Street.<ref><ref><ref>
